channel.title: Cant get server up to public!
channel.description:
About 6 months ago I had a private server, worked on it a little and stopped. This past week I started messing around with C++ and Java again and was looking over Runescape Private Servers. I wanted to start up a Private Server and looked over tutorials to get to this point, but still I can't seem to get my Server working. I run the "runserver" file and it says started 127.0.0.1 4359, then I open moparscape and login with a username and password and leave the server ip and port number the same (default). It logs me in and everything seems to up, I give my friend my ip address and the default port number but he can't connect... =/
Port forwarding, I didn't look into but maybe someone should help me towards that way and yes I do have a wireless router not sure if thats what there talking about.. I have set up a No-Ip but all fails... hyperscape.no-ip.biz
Any suggestions? :confused:

item.title: Cant get server up to public!
item.dc:creator: @Xbox_Modder Xbox Modder
item.description:
@Xbox_Modder wrote:

Go to http://192.168.1.1/

Now click on the tab that says Gaming and Applications or whatever

Now click on Port Range Forward

Now Type in RuneScape Private Server for the name

Port start - 43594

Port End - 43594

Now Protocol is both

IP address will be the IP under your connection like if its wireless right click the icon click status and then click support and the IP address there should match the one on the port forwarding thing so mine would be 100 all I have to do is type in 100 for the last 3 numbers then click the check box under enable then click save setting and you can have people join your server!

I hope I helped

Read full topic
item.source: Cant get server up to public!

item.title: Cant get server up to public!
item.dc:creator: @HyperCom HyperCom
item.description:
@HyperCom wrote:

I tried the port forwarding and doesn’t work because I cant find out my routers password and username =/
hamachi seems fine with me, I signed up for it and have a account but don’t understand how people connect to my server?
Once they connect on the hamachi and open moparscape and do they put for the port and ip? Or what? [br][size=1]Posted on: April 23, 2007, 02:10:12 PM[/size][hr] [br][size=1]Posted on: April 23, 2007, 02:37:02 PM[/size][hr]someone help please!

item.title: Cant get server up to public!
item.dc:creator: @Taylor_John0 Taylor John0
item.description:
@Taylor_John0 wrote:

do it this way…instead of u guys talkin bout firewalls…
right click your internet connection(bottom right hand corner of screen,taskbar,click it,which ever works, wireless or local)and the thing pops up.click support tab, and ur ip comes up.log into your router(top one) and fine port fowarding, and make range from 43594 and to as blank, then make ip same as the one opn support thingy, and tell ur friend to try

if this doesn’t help then good, cuz it’s confusing

Read full topic
